property.name: zoneName
property.label: Zone Name
property.description: Enter the zone name

property.name: headingTitle
property.label: Heading Title
property.description: Heading title for author.

property.name: headerAlignment
property.label: Heading Alignment
property.description: Header Alignment

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: allowImages
property.label: Allow Image Upload?
property.description: Enable image upload.

property.name: attachmentAccept
property.label: Image File Types
property.description: Specify allowed image file types (CSV list of file extensions)

property.name: topicRequired
property.label: Require Topics
property.description: Make topic as required field.

property.name: useTopics
property.label: Display a Topic
property.description: Enable to display a topic selection

property.name: allowCategories
property.label: Allow Categories
property.description: Enable optional category selection

property.name: allowThemes
property.label: Allow Themes
property.description: Enable optional theme selection

property.name: showDuplicates
property.label: Show Similar Ideas
property.description: Search for ideas with a similar title

property.name: simIdeasLimit
property.label: Set Similar Idea Search Limit
property.description: Maximum number of similar ideas to search for (less is faster)

property.name: editStatus
property.label: Edit: Allow Status
property.description: Check to enable idea status change

property.name: requireComment
property.label: Edit: Require Status Comment
property.description: Check to require a comment on status change in edit mode

property.name: showRelatedFiles
property.label: Enable Related Files Upload
property.description: Check to enable the idea creator to upload a related file

property.name: relatedFilesAccept
property.label: Related File Types
property.description: Enter the related file types allowed (CSV list of file extensions)

property.name: showCustomFields
property.label: Show Custom Fields
property.description: Enable to display all defined custom fields on the detail page

property.name: customFieldSetName
property.label: Custom Field Set Name
property.description: Specify the custom metadata field set API name. Leave blank to fall back to the Ideas Settings field set.

property.name: presetField
property.label: Preset Field
property.description: Specify the API name for a custom field on the Idea object that will be populated with the provided preset value. Leave blank to ignore.

property.name: presetValue
property.label: Preset Value
property.description: Enter a value for the specified preset field on the Idea object. This value will be added to every new Idea created.

property.name: showRequestedBy
property.label: Show Requested By
property.description: Requested By for Idea Detail Page

property.name: ideaListURL
property.label: Idea List Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea List page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c'.

property.name: ideaDetailURL
property.label: Idea Detail Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea Detail page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c.'

property.name: topicSet
property.label: Topics
property.description: Enter a CSV list of topics to limit the topic selection

property.name: categoriesAllowed
property.label: Categories
property.description: Categories allowed for zone - Enter a CSV list of categories for the current zone

property.name: statusAllowed
property.label: Idea Status List
property.description: Enter the allowed idea status list (csv) for the current zone

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class
property.description: Class for applying custom styling.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates the filter component to a specific list.
